note:
Plaything of the winds. Professional cat herder, writer, dreamer, dancer, time traveler extraordinaire. Adventurer, moss gardener, fencer, needleworker, crocheter, and staunch defender of the serial comma.

Profile image: A white woman of indeterminate age takes a selfie in front of a 3 meter tall snow wall. She is wearing a black face mask with Star Trek written on it in gold letters, a wide-brimmed hat tied on by a gauzey beige scarf, and a pair of sunglasses on top of her head.
